description: This Java source file defines the class `GetAttributeInfosRequest`, which extends `DeviceRequest`. It represents a request to retrieve attribute information from a Zigbee device, targeting specific clusters and endpoints, and handles executing the request and processing the response.

classes.name: GetAttributeInfosRequest
classes.description: Represents a request to fetch attribute information from a specified cluster and endpoint on a Zigbee device. It includes properties like endpoint ID, cluster ID, server/client distinction, and optional manufacturer ID, and implements the execution logic for issuing the request.

methods.name: GetAttributeInfosRequest
methods.description: Constructor to initialize the request with device specific parameters including request ID, device EUI, endpoint ID, cluster ID, server flag, and manufacturer ID.

methods.name: executeDeviceRequest
methods.description: Executes the request on a given `MockZigbeeDevice` by retrieving the target endpoint and cluster, then sending a response with the attribute information.
